scripts.clean-components: npm run clean-strata.foundation.core && npm run clean-strata-client.core && npm run clean-strata-client.react
scripts.clean-tests: npm run clean-strata.foundation.coretest && npm run clean-strata-client.reacttest
scripts.clean: npm run clean-components && npm run clean-tests
scripts.build-components: npm run build-strata.foundation.core && npm run build-strata-client.core && npm run build-strata-client.react
scripts.build-tests: npm run build-strata.foundation.coretest && npm run build-strata-client.reacttest
scripts.build: npm run build-components && npm run build-tests
